name: Scissors Paper Rock (Greencat LongClaw)
description:
Hey,

Greencat here, and welcome to my submission to the 254 weekly Game Jam  of "Rock Paper Scissors"!

You can get to my YouTube channel at Greencat LongClaw or at this link: https://bit.ly/GreencatLongClaw

Like And Subscribe!!

(also, If i get enough support, I might continue making this game better after the game jam...)
